note: Tinker, Tool Tester, Fabricator, Facilitator, Poet/Prosetrist, Person.  Studying fibrary sciences - textile information/communication behavior - how/why of textile contexts through/across space/time - fabric, felt, paper, basketry, and more.  HUUmanist - no single thread can avoid our interwoven existence. Dangerously close to the (gasp) heresy of animism.
